```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
gminder1 <- read.csv(file = 'C:\\Users\\tessa\\Downloads\\gapminder-5060.csv')
head(gminder1)
```
```{r}
A = gminder1[,c("country","lifeExp","gdpPercap")]
A1 = A[A$country == "United States",]
View(A1)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
X = ggplot(A1, aes(x = (lifeExp), y = (gdpPercap))) + geom_point() 
X + ggtitle("United States lifeExp vs. gdpPercap")
```

```{r}
gminder1 <- read.csv(file = 'E:\\gapminder-5060.csv')
head(gminder1)
```
```{r}
A = gminder1[,c("country","lifeExp","gdpPercap")]
A2 = A[A$country == "Canada",]
A2[2,2] = 69
View(A2)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
XC = ggplot(A2, aes(x = (lifeExp), y = (gdpPercap))) + geom_point() 
XC + ggtitle("Canadian lifeExp vs. gdpPercap")
```
